content: body {      font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, avenir next, avenir, segoe ui, helvetica neue, helvetica, Cantarell, Ubuntu, roboto, noto, arial, sans-serif;      margin: 0;    }    header#section-basics {      background-color: rgb(224, 224, 224);      margin: 2rem;      border-radius: 2rem;      padding: 2rem;    }    #basics-name {      font-weight: bolder;      font-size: 3rem;      text-align: center;      color: rgb(61, 61, 61);    }    #basics-name span::before {      content: '- ';      padding: 0 0.25rem;    }    ul {      margin: 0;      padding: 0;    }    ul li {      list-style: none;      margin: 0;      padding: 0;    }    #basics-contact {      display: flex;      flex-direction: row;      justify-content: center;      align-items: center;      gap: 0.75rem;    }    #basics-contact a {      text-decoration: none;      font-weight: 500;      font-size: 1.25rem;      color: rgb(12, 0, 80);      border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(73, 73, 73);    }    #basics-contact a:hover {      color: blue;    }    address {      display: flex;      flex-direction: row;      justify-content: center;      margin: 0.75rem;      color: rgb(49, 49, 49);      font-style: normal;    }    address div::after {      content: ', ';      padding-right: 0.25rem;    }    address div:last-child::after {      content: '';    }    #profiles-list {      display: flex;      flex-direction: row;    }    main#resume-content {      max-width: 1200px;      margin: 0 auto;      padding: 2rem 1.5rem;    }    main header {      margin: 0;      padding: 0;    }    h2 {      font-size: 2rem;      font-weight: 500;      color: rgb(44, 16, 70);      margin-bottom: 1rem;    }    h3 {      font-size: 1.5rem;      font-weight: 600;      color: rgb(44, 16, 70);      margin-bottom: 1rem;    }    p {      font-size: 1.25rem;      color: black;      line-height: 1.25;    }    #skills-list h3 {      padding-bottom: 1rem;      border-bottom: 1px solid blue;      width: fit-content;    }    .skill-keywords-list {      display: flex;      flex-direction: row;      flex-wrap: wrap;      gap: 1rem;    }    .skill-keywords-list li {      background-color: rgb(255, 255, 164);      padding: 0.5rem 1.5rem;      font-weight: bold;      color: rgb(29, 29, 29);    }
